This teen comedy stars Zac Efron as a high school student who gets to relive his teenage years when he wakes up one morning back in his own body. It's a fun and entertaining ride with plenty of humor and heart.

If you're still unsure, another option could be "Bend It Like Beckham" (2002), which is an uplifting and inspiring film about two young women chasing their dreams to play professional soccer. With great performances from Keira Knightley and Parminder Nagra, this movie is a wonderful choice for anyone looking for a feel-good story.
